title: P3 LFT
body:
I can play ad/sp/jg 
Able to play all champs that are in meta right now
online every night (after 7pm GMT +10)
have working mic and headset
have skype and ts ID


Note: I already have enough 75 points to get final form ward skin this season so I dont intend to look for those teams just play casually to grind points aka winning or losing does not matter
by saying that, I am looking for solid and serious teams to improve communication skills and in-game skills!

*** I do also expect teams should be able to play regularly. It doesn't need to be every single night, 3-4 nights prolly
